text: 1.17 Hab 2.4, Jon 3.36, Lom 3.21-22, Gal 3.11, Hib 10.38 Takaw adek anɨb ak, chɨnop yomek anɨgɨl nopun, God chɨnop gek binɨb suŋtep ne mɨdobun. Chɨn tap olap ma gɨnɨgun, Klays nop nokom gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgun ak nɨm, Klays nop gos lɨnɨgon God ne nɨŋɨd chɨnop gek, binɨb suŋtep ne mɨdobun. Adek anɨb anep, buk Baybol ak tɨkɨl agɨlak, Binɨb suŋtep ne okok, nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd nɨm, pelpel yenɨgabal agɨl tɨkɨlak.
